data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article De Lucena, Carlos Alberto S., Soares, Helena Gouvea (2016): Review of species of the Astyanax bimaculatus “ caudal peduncle spot ” subgroup sensu Garutti & Langeani (Characiformes, Characidae) from the rio La Plata and rio São Francisco drainages and coastal systems of southern Brazil and Uruguay. Zootaxa 4072 (1): 101-125, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4072.1.5
